name: Escape Challenge 8:Escape the red room games
name_original: Escape Challenge 8:Escape the red room games
description:
You woke up in a gloomy room and came out of the noisy footsteps. What happened? You have to hurry out of this room to find out.

* Exquisite picture
* Clever digital puzzles
* Thrilling mysterious game rhythm
* From easy to difficult, suitable for all players
